title: Simulation/VR-Based Instructional Design for Personalized Language Learning Pathways

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Conducted in vocational training institutions' language education settings, providing real-time feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized language learning pathways in a simulation environment with at least three stages.
Learners can utilize contextually appropriate language expressions with over 80% accuracy when performing VR-based tasks.
Learners can revise and improve their learning strategies at least twice based on peer feedback and formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
